price: Реци: „Само Аллах зна! А ја сам само јасни упозоритељ.“
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
